div.h3: Extended Closure and Cancellation of Regents Exams

nav.div: Argyle Central School District » News » What's New » Extended Closure and Cancellation of Regents Exams

div.div: Extended Closure and Cancellation of Regents Exams

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(40, 40, 40); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: I hope you are all doing well.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: I am writing to provide you with additional updates regarding the new extended school closure, regents exams cancellation, and more.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: As you may have heard, Governor Andrew Cuomo has now extended the statewide school closure to April 29, 2020.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Our schools will remain closed during this time to comply with the order and to limit the spread of the COVID-19 coronavirus. Students will continue with at-home instruction through April 29 as directed by the state of New York.

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;
list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: NYS Regents Examinations: The New York State Board of Regents announced that the

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Regents exams scheduled for the June 2020 testing window have been cancelled.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: Additional information and answers to the many questions you may have regarding this can be found on the “

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: As a reminder, the district’s “Scots Guest Wi-Fi” account is open and available for academic use in the Elementary parking lot. Additional information is posted on the district’s webpage. Free Wi-Fi provided by Adirondack Technical Solutions continues to be available

li.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(255, 255, 255); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: We understand how difficult this situation has been for our students and for families. We continue to have resources available on our website including child care for essential workers in the community, and links to important mental health resources and contact information.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 255); background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

p.span: ” webpage if you or your child are looking for community resources to cope with stress/anxiety of the current situation.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;
background-color: transparent; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;
background-color: transparent; font-family: "Times New Roman"; font-size: 11pt; white-space: pre-wrap;
font-size: 11pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;

div.div:
5023 State Route 40, Argyle, NY 12809
Phone (518) 638-8243 | Fax 518-638-6373
